languages.text: "Служить свету и правде и величию, кои есть Империум".
"To serve the light and truth and greatness that is the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Служить свету и правде и величию, кои есть Империум".

traits.locale_text: "To serve the light and truth and greatness that is the Imperium."

"To serve the light and truth and greatness that is the Imperium."

languages.text: «Servir a la luz y a la gran verdad que es el Imperium».
languages.original_text: "To serve the light and truth and greatness that is the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Servir a la luz y a la gran verdad que es el Imperium».

languages.text: 「帝国という光、真実、そして偉大さに仕えることだ」
languages.original_text: "To serve the light and truth and greatness that is the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国という光、真実、そして偉大さに仕えることだ」

languages.text: “为了侍奉光明、真理与伟大的帝国。”
languages.original_text: "To serve the light and truth and greatness that is the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “为了侍奉光明、真理与伟大的帝国。”

languages.text: « Servir la lumière, la vérité et la grandeur qu'incarne l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "To serve the light and truth and greatness that is the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Servir la lumière, la vérité et la grandeur qu'incarne l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Dem Licht und der Wahrheit und der Erhabenheit dienen, die das Imperium ist."
languages.original_text: "To serve the light and truth and greatness that is the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Dem Licht und der Wahrheit und der Erhabenheit dienen, die das Imperium ist."

languages.text: "Işığa, hakikate ve yüce İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmek."
languages.original_text: "To serve the light and truth and greatness that is the Imperium."
